name: Who Played These Characters? Online Trivia | Name the Player | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which famous John played John Kelso and Jonathon Trager?
questions.explanation:
John Cusack.

	John Cusack played John Kelso in the 1997 thriller "Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil" and he portrayed Jonathon Trager in the 2001 romantic comedy "Serendipity".

questions.text: Which up and coming star of "Charlie's Angels:  Full Throttle" has portrayed the characters Kelly Ernswiler and Stanley Yelnats IV?
questions.explanation:
Shia LaBeouf.

	Shia portrayed Kelly Ernswiler in the little seen dramedy from 2003 "The Battle of Shaker Heights".  He portrayed Stanley Yelnats IV in the suprise hit of 2003 "Holes".

questions.text: Which of the following legendary actors has portrayed Rankin Fitch and Senator Kevin Keeley?
questions.explanation:
Gene Hackman.

	Gene portrayed Rankin Fitch in the 2003 court room drama "Runaway Jury" and he donned a dress for his role of Senator Kevin Keeley in the 1996 comedy "The Birdcage".

questions.text: Which of the following highly versatile actors has portrayed the characters Eric Knox and Frank Mercer?
questions.explanation:
Sam Rockwell.

	Sam played the devilish Eric Knox in the 2000 star studded action flick "Charlie's Angels".  He portrayed the character Frank Mercer opposite Nicolas Cage in the 2003 comedy "Matchstick Men".

questions.text: Which of the following big box office draws has portrayed Joseph Donnelly and Frank T.J. Mackey?
questions.explanation:
Tom Cruise.

	Tom Cruise had two of his least popular box office successes with these two film roles.  He played Joseph Donnelly opposite Nicole Kidman in Ron Howard's 1992 drama "Far and Away".  Tom then went on in 1999 to play a highly unorthodox motivational speaker in Paul Thomas Anderson's drama "Magnolia".

questions.text: Which of the following Kansas born actresses portrayed Jessie Bannister and Joyce Palmer?
questions.explanation:
Kirstie Alley.

	That is right, Kirstie Alley was born in Wichita, Kansas!  She played Jessie Bannister in the 1990 comedy flop "Madhouse" and Joyce Palmer in the 1989 comedy "Loverboy".

questions.text: Which of the following comedy queens has portrayed Delores Bickerman and Martha Wilson?
questions.explanation:
Betty White.

	Miss Betty played Mrs. Delores Bickerman in the 1999 comedy thriller "Lake Placid".  She portrayed Mrs. Martha Wilson in the 1998 straight to video comedy "Dennis the Menace Strikes Again".

questions.text: Which of the following blondes babes has portrayed Sukie Ridgemont and Selina Kyle?
questions.explanation:
Michelle Pfeiffer.

	Michelle played Sukie Ridgemont opposite Cher and Susan Sarandon in the 1987 bewitching comedy "The Witches of Eastwick".  She played Selina Kyle opposite Michael Keaton in the 1992 dark action flick "Batman Returns".

questions.text: Which actress, who is famous for her voice, has portrayed Samantha Cole and Olive Neal?
questions.explanation:
Jennifer Tilly.

	Jennifer played Samantha Cole opposite Jim Carrey in the 1997 comedy "Liar Liar".  She played Olive Neal opposite John Cusack in the 1994 comedy "Bullets Over Broadway".

questions.text: Which of the following actresses portrayed the characters Rosalie Mullins and Inga Gunther?
questions.explanation:
Joan Cusack.

	Joan Cusack starred as Rosalie Mullins opposite Jack Black in the 2003 comedy "School of Rock".  She played boyfriend obsessed Inga Gunther opposite Ellen DeGeneres in the 1996 comedy "Mr. Wrong".
